attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to stop the blatant discrimination of Prison Service Instructors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the blatant discrimination of prison service civilain instructors, in that they where the only ones that were never given a pay increase for 2006/2007. this is against the Goverment, Home Office and Prison Service Rules and Regulations

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
